body_html:
Well i found a solution by installation through source code.
in git log file(b43d0f3) " git log --oneline --decorate" Is saw upgrade!

(HEAD -> master, origin/master, origin/HEAD) Merge pull request #15233 from ManHyuk/typo
70644fc fix typo
688bc53 Merge pull request #15225 from Androbin/patch-1
8267844 Enable GCS filesystem for Windows (#14856)
d3e35f9 Also install libssl-dev to make pip/py3.6 work properly. (#15226)
c470142 Update .gitignore
3a05c11 Merge pull request #15195 from rongjiecomputer/wav
0e49c54 Merge pull request #15021 from freedomtan/bmp-doc
774f4d3 Merge pull request #15205 from tensorflow/gunan-patch-1
cae2e56 Delete Dockerfile.devel-gpu-cuda9-cudnn7
b43d0f3 Upgrade cuda to 9 and cudnn version to 7. (#14773)
f7d392d Merge pull request #15197 from caisq/nomac-tag
28b92cd Fix tag in source_remote_test: no_mac --> nomac

Than I fallowed the instructions mentioned at
https://gist.github.com/Brainiarc7/6d6c3f23ea057775b72c52817759b25c

And done (for python2.7!)

$ ipython2
Python 2.7.12 (default, Dec 4 2017, 14:50:18)
Type "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

IPython 4.0.1 -- An enhanced Interactive Python.
? -> Introduction and overview of IPython's features.
%quickref -> Quick reference.
help -> Python's own help system.
object? -> Details about 'object', use 'object??' for extra details.

In [1]: import tensorflow as tf

In [2]: sess = tf.Session()
2017-12-10 13:28:46.568828: I tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_gpu_executor.cc:895] successful NUMA node read from SysFS had negative value (-1), but there must be at least one NUMA node, so returning NUMA node zero
2017-12-10 13:28:46.569233: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1062] Found device 0 with properties:
name: GeForce GT 750M major: 3 minor: 0 memoryClockRate(GHz): 0.967
pciBusID: 0000:04:00.0
totalMemory: 1.95GiB freeMemory: 1.72GiB
2017-12-10 13:28:46.569263: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1152] Creating TensorFlow device (/device:GPU:0) -> (device: 0, name: GeForce GT 750M, pci bus id: 0000:04:00.0, compute capability: 3.0)

in git log file(b43d0f3) " git log --oneline --decorate" Is saw upgrade!
(HEAD -> master, origin/master, origin/HEAD) Merge pull request #15233 from ManHyuk/typo

body:
Well i found a solution by installation through source code.
in git log file(b43d0f3) " git log --oneline --decorate" Is saw **upgrade**!

(HEAD -> master, origin/master, origin/HEAD) Merge pull request #15233 from ManHyuk/typo
70644fc fix typo
688bc53 Merge pull request #15225 from Androbin/patch-1
8267844 Enable GCS filesystem for Windows (#14856)
d3e35f9 Also install libssl-dev to make pip/py3.6 work properly. (#15226)
c470142 Update .gitignore
3a05c11 Merge pull request #15195 from rongjiecomputer/wav
0e49c54 Merge pull request #15021 from freedomtan/bmp-doc
774f4d3 Merge pull request #15205 from tensorflow/gunan-patch-1
cae2e56 Delete Dockerfile.devel-gpu-cuda9-cudnn7
b43d0f3 **Upgrade cuda to 9 and cudnn version to 7. (#14773)**
f7d392d Merge pull request #15197 from caisq/nomac-tag
28b92cd Fix tag in source_remote_test: no_mac --> nomac

Than I fallowed the instructions mentioned at 
https://gist.github.com/Brainiarc7/6d6c3f23ea057775b72c52817759b25c

And done (for python2.7!)

$ ipython2
Python 2.7.12 (default, Dec  4 2017, 14:50:18) 
Type "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

IPython 4.0.1 -- An enhanced Interactive Python.
?         -> Introduction and overview of IPython's features.
%quickref -> Quick reference.
help      -> Python's own help system.
object?   -> Details about 'object', use 'object??' for extra details.

In [1]: import tensorflow as tf

In [2]: sess = tf.Session()
2017-12-10 13:28:46.568828: I tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_gpu_executor.cc:895] successful NUMA node read from SysFS had negative value (-1), but there must be at least one NUMA node, so returning NUMA node zero
2017-12-10 13:28:46.569233: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1062] Found device 0 with properties: 
name: GeForce GT 750M major: 3 minor: 0 memoryClockRate(GHz): 0.967
pciBusID: 0000:04:00.0
totalMemory: 1.95GiB freeMemory: 1.72GiB
2017-12-10 13:28:46.569263: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1152] Creating TensorFlow device (/device:GPU:0) -> (device: 0, name: GeForce GT 750M, pci bus id: 0000:04:00.0, compute capability: 3.0)
